alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 07 at 1:00AM EDT until April 07 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Lowndes County in south central Georgia... * Until 130 AM EDT. * At 100 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Dasher, I-75 At Exit 5 and Twin Lakes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
